customer_id.semantic_description: Unique identifier for each customer in the system.

customer_unique_id.semantic_description: A unique identifier for different purchases made by the same customer.

customer_zip_code_prefix.semantic_description: The initial digits of the customer's postal code representing their location.

customer_city.semantic_description: The city in which the customer resides.

customer_state.semantic_description: The state in which the customer resides, provided as an abbreviation.

olist_customers_dataset.role: Represents the customers who make purchases.
olist_customers_dataset.description: This table contains detailed information about customers, including their geographic location data which is crucial for order deliveries.

geolocation_zip_code_prefix.semantic_description: The prefix of zip codes used to identify specific geographic locations.

geolocation_lat.semantic_description: Latitude information corresponding to the geolocation's zip code prefix.

geolocation_lng.semantic_description: Longitude information corresponding to the geolocation's zip code prefix.

geolocation_city.semantic_description: The city associated with the geolocation.

geolocation_state.semantic_description: The state associated with the geolocation.

olist_geolocation_dataset.role: Represents the geographic locations used for delivery and shipping purposes.
olist_geolocation_dataset.description: This table provides detailed latitude and longitude data that can be used to map out delivery zones based on zip code prefixes.

order_id.semantic_description: Unique identifier for each order within the order items context.

order_item_id.semantic_description: Identifies a specific item within an order, as orders can contain multiple items.

product_id.semantic_description: Unique identifier for the product involved in an order item.

seller_id.semantic_description: Unique identifier for the seller providing the product for the order item.

shipping_limit_date.semantic_description: The deadline by which the seller must ship the order item to meet delivery estimates.

price.semantic_description: The amount charged for the order item.

freight_value.semantic_description: The cost charged for shipping the order item.

olist_order_items_dataset.role: Represents the individual items included in each customer order.
olist_order_items_dataset.description: This table details each product item in a customer's order, including pricing, shipping, and associated seller.

order_id.semantic_description: Unique identifier correlating to each order, used to connect payment details to the respective order.

payment_sequential.semantic_description: A sequence number indicating the order in which payments were made related to a purchase.

payment_type.semantic_description: The type of payment method used, such as credit card, debit card, boleto, etc.

payment_installments.semantic_description: Number of installments in which the payment is divided for the order.

payment_value.semantic_description: Total amount paid in the transaction.

olist_order_payments_dataset.role: Captures the payment details for each order.
olist_order_payments_dataset.description: This table details the payments associated with orders, including the type and value of payments made.

review_id.semantic_description: A unique identifier for each review.

order_id.semantic_description: Identifier relating the review to the order.

review_score.semantic_description: The score given in the review, usually from 1 to 5.

review_comment_title.semantic_description: Title of the comment provided by the reviewer.

review_comment_message.semantic_description: Detailed message left by the reviewer about their experience.

review_creation_date.semantic_description: The date on which the review was created.

review_answer_timestamp.semantic_description: Timestamp indicating when a review was answered or processed.

olist_order_reviews_dataset.role: Details reviews left by customers for their orders.
olist_order_reviews_dataset.description: This table aggregates customer feedback, showing ratings and reviews for orders, which is vital for service improvement.

order_id.semantic_description: Unique identifier for each order placed.

customer_id.semantic_description: Links the order to its respective customer in the customers dataset.

order_status.semantic_description: Indicates the current status of the order such as delivered, shipped, etc.

order_purchase_timestamp.semantic_description: Date and time the order was placed.

order_approved_at.semantic_description: Timestamp when the order was confirmed and approved.

order_delivered_carrier_date.semantic_description: Date the carrier received the order for delivery to the customer.

order_delivered_customer_date.semantic_description: Actual date when the order was delivered to the customer.

order_estimated_delivery_date.semantic_description: Date estimated for the order's delivery.

olist_orders_dataset.role: Captures details of each order placed in the marketplace.
olist_orders_dataset.description: This table stores comprehensive details on customer orders. It forms the base for analyzing order status and delivery timelines.

product_id.semantic_description: Unique identifier for each product available in the marketplace.

product_category_name.semantic_description: Category name of the product in Portuguese.

product_name_lenght.semantic_description: Length of the product name in characters.

product_description_lenght.semantic_description: Length of the product description in characters.

product_photos_qty.semantic_description: Number of photos available for the product.

product_weight_g.semantic_description: Weight of the product in grams.

product_length_cm.semantic_description: Length of the product in centimeters.

product_height_cm.semantic_description: Height of the product in centimeters.

product_width_cm.semantic_description: Width of the product in centimeters.

olist_products_dataset.role: Details the products available for purchase.
olist_products_dataset.description: This table provides a catalog of products including attributes like size, weight, and category, supporting diverse product queries.

seller_id.semantic_description: Unique identifier for each seller in the marketplace.

seller_zip_code_prefix.semantic_description: Prefix of the seller's postal code, indicating seller location.

seller_city.semantic_description: The city where the seller is located.

seller_state.semantic_description: The state where the seller is located, provided as an abbreviation.

olist_sellers_dataset.description: This table documents the sellers within the marketplace, offering information crucial for logistics and sales tracking by location.

product_category_name.semantic_description: The product category name in Portuguese.

product_category_name_english.semantic_description: The English translation of the product category name.

product_category_name_translation.role: Translates product category names from Portuguese to English.
product_category_name_translation.description: This table provides translations of product categories, enabling cross-linguistic understanding and categorization.

database_description: This database is structured to support an e-commerce platform by storing detailed information about customers, orders, products, sellers, and geolocations. It is designed to facilitate operations such as order processing, shipment tracking, and customer feedback analysis within the online sales environment.
